2057510.name: Café Rouge CG Gallery
2057510.description:
This downloadable content contains all 60 artwork illustrations from the 2020 remake of the Café Rouge visual novel drawn by the artists of Somate Studio, who have previously worked for Otomate, and the blockbuster movie "Weathering with You" created by the same director as "Your Name" the anime movie.

Please enjoy this collection of 60 artworks to use as your digital wallpapers or for personal use, as a gift for purchasing our game on Steam.
